description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A scrolling shoot 'em up / platformer hybrid.  Change colours to match the oncoming enemies or shoot them to survive. Fight relentless bosses in Arcade mode.  Features 4 game modes and 5 difficulties.
description.short: A scrolling shoot 'em up / platformer hybrid.  Change colours to match the oncoming enemies or shoot them to survive. Fight relentless bosses in Arcade mode.  Features 4 game modes and 5 difficulties.
